name: Ore Miners
description:
Build your base and mine ore for resources. Try to survive the enemy waves.

This game was made with Visual Studio and .NET Forms, so thank you Bill Gates.

Design, programming, soundfx, music, all by Devastatic. 2023.

Quick tips:

  • Build some mines. They will spawn miners and you will get more ore.
  • With ore you can build your defences.
  • You can upgrade your defences.
  • Experiment with different starting positions and building placement.
